summary: bovine coronavirus (BCoV) belong to the genus Betacoronavirus of the family Coronaviridae. the virus are widespread around the world and cause enteric or respiratory infections among cattle, leading to important economic losses to the beef and dairy industry worldwide. the correlation between Gravy and aroma and nucleotide at the third codon position of each codon and ENC values. in (A) positions of the BCoV strains in the plot of the first two major axes by correspondence analysis (COA) of relative synonymous codon usage (RSCU) values.
